article_title: Christine Lagarde plays down beef with Janet Yellen over rate-hike timing
article_text:
Getty Images Federal Reserve Board Chairwoman Janet Yellen (L) with International Monetary Fund Managing Director Christine Lagarde

Lagarde said that emerging markets are better prepared for the first Fed rate hike, having learned lessons from the taper-tantrum in May 2013.

She said she was pleased that Yellen has stressed that the timing of the first rate hike depends on the economic data.

More from MarketWatch

twitter.description: Christine Lagarde, the managing director of the IMF, played down her differences with Fed Chairwoman Janet Yellen over the timing of the U.S. central bank’s first rate hike since 2006.
